No problem, here's a table with the top 20 companies (in alphabetical order) with in-house design teams that specialize in graphic design, motion graphics design, product design, and user experience design based in the UK:

Again, note that the design team sizes are estimates and may change over time, and some notable design leaders may have since left their respective companies. Additionally, some of these companies have design teams that specialize in different areas, so not all team members may work on graphic design, motion graphics design, product design, and user experience design.
